alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Pulaski; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 10:50AM CDT until April 13 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR WESTERN DENT...SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI...NORTHERN TEXAS AND PHELPS COUNTIES... At 1049 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fort Leonard Wood to 6 miles northwest of Cabool, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rolla... Fort Leonard Wood... Montauk State Park... St. James... Licking... Houston... Edgar Springs... Lenox... Montauk... Beulah... Bucyrus... Hazelton... Lake Spring... Success... Anutt... Roby... Lecoma... Prescott... Rosati... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 180 and 183, and between mile markers 191 and 200. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
